mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (user_id, title, content, like_count, view_count, comments, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{likeCount}, #{viewCount}, #{comments}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT post_id AS postId, user_id AS userId, title, content, like_count AS likeCount, view_count AS viewCount, comments, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM posts WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM posts WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND user_id = #{userId}
